inclusion.criterion: warm auto Immune hemolytic anemia primary or secondary
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Microangiopathic hemolytic anemia ( Thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura (TTP) , Hemolytic-uremic syndrome (HUS) , Disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC) )
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome, which is a type of microangiopathic hemolytic anemia. However, the genetic survey revealed ADAMTS13 >10%, indicating that this is not TTP.
